content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The process of adding / removing people to/from DG is partially automated through support.epam.com. More details are available here: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMHELP/Distribution+Groups+overview#DistributionGroupsoverview-DistributionGroupmembershiplistupdate\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Distribution Group membership list update\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Also, for certain DG types group owner can add/remove members without involvement of Support Team.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In general, SD Processing Center team is responsible for DG membership update for “regular” (or manual) distribution groups update, and SD Analysts team\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please carefully read \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"DG membership update\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" section of \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/sKuyFg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Distribution Groups Creation and Management\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" article.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The general approach is that any change in DG membership list should be either approved or initiated by group owner. But pay a special attention to the list of exceptions and special cases where approval from DG owner might be not required, replaced or vice versa – not enough.\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
